name: John
description: A dedicated mayor who has served the town for twenty years. John works tirelessly to keep the community running smoothly while sometimes struggling to connect with the younger generation.
desires: Earn respect from the younger generation

memories.content: Been mayor for twenty years today. Town council gave me a plaque. Sometimes I wonder if they're just being polite, but Mrs. Chen said the streetlights I installed saved her from a fall last winter.
Young Sage brought me fresh bread. Didn't ask for anything, just said 'thank you for the town.' Maybe the kids understand more than I give them credit for.

relationships.name: Rose
relationships.notes: Local florist who beautifies the town center. Professional respect.

relationships.name: Sage
relationships.notes: Young baker who shows gratitude for town services. Promising young citizen.

relationships.name: Griff
relationships.notes: Local craftsman. Checks in occasionally, professional relationship.
